name: Attached to Life
description:
# Attached to Life

A zombie game on which you have to find and attach weapons, hairstyles, and accessories to your character to survive the 10 rounds!

# Developed for the SGDJamIII in Unreal Engine 4 by:

Mikel Torrecilla

Jeff Onsea

Daniel Estradera

Jorge Alvarez 

Cristian Lopez

# Third-party assets:

- All models were taken from Synty Studios' Apocalypse pack and City Zombies pack

https://syntystore.com/products/polygon-apocalypse-pack

https://bit.ly/3ALvNuB

- Some of the animations were taken from Mixamo (others were animated on Unreal)

https://www.mixamo.com/#/
- Sounds were taken from ZapSplat

https://www.zapsplat.com/

- Music is from RossBugden

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQKGLOK2FqmVgVwYferltKQ
